Sentencas: We report systematic investigation of the surface properties of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolytes with the control of the grain boundary (GB) density at the surface, and its effects on electrochemical activities.
Titulo: Effects of surface chemistry and microstructure of electrolyte on oxygen reduction kinetics of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The GB density of thin surface layers deposited on single crystal YSZ substrates is controlled by changing the annealing temperature (750-1450 degrees C).
Titulo: Effects of surface chemistry and microstructure of electrolyte on oxygen reduction kinetics of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Higher oxygen reduction reactions (ORR) kinetics is observed in samples annealed at lower temperatures.
Titulo: Effects of surface chemistry and microstructure of electrolyte on oxygen reduction kinetics of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The higher ORR activity is ascribed to the higher GB density at the YSZ surface where 'mobile' oxide ion vacancies are more populated.
Titulo: Effects of surface chemistry and microstructure of electrolyte on oxygen reduction kinetics of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Meanwhile, oxide ion vacancies concurrently created with yttrium segregation at the surface at the higher annealing temperature are considered inactive to oxygen incorporation reactions.
Titulo: Effects of surface chemistry and microstructure of electrolyte on oxygen reduction kinetics of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Our results provide additional insight into the interplay between the surface chemistry, microstructures, and electrochemical activity.
Titulo: Effects of surface chemistry and microstructure of electrolyte on oxygen reduction kinetics of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: They potentially provide important guidelines for engineering the electrolyte electrode interfaces of solid oxide fuel cells for higher electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Effects of surface chemistry and microstructure of electrolyte on oxygen reduction kinetics of solid oxide fuel cells
Effects of surface chemistry and microstructure of electrolyte on oxygen reduction kinetics of solid oxide fuel cells
